sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: At Resh and Thosh, we are committed to leveraging the latest technological advancements to transform the way your customers experience travel, ensuring efficiency, personalization, and innovation at every step. Explore how our suite of software products and capabilities empowers travel businesses to thrive in a competitive landscapeAutomation is another game-changer in the travel industry. Our software solutions automate various routine tasks such as booking management, itinerary planning, and customer service. This not only reduces operational costs but also eliminates human error, ensuring a seamless and reliable experience for travelers. From booking and payment processing to customer service and itinerary management, our automated solutions reduce manual effort and minimize errors.One of the most significant shifts in the travel industry is the move towards personalization, driven by artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Our AI-powered platforms analyze vast datasets, including past travel behaviors, preferences, and demographic information, to offer personalized recommendations. This level of personalization not only enhances customer satisfaction but also builds loyalty and repeat business.Our cutting-edge software is transforming the travel industry, offering unparalleled levels of personalization, efficiency, security, and sustainability. At Resh and Thosh, we are at the forefront of this revolution, providing innovative solutions that empower travelers and travel businesses alike. By embracing these technologies, you can enhance your operations, improve customer satisfaction, and stay competitive in a rapidly evolving market. Let us help you transform your travel experience with our cutting-edge software solutions.

sections.heading: Mission
sections.content: To empower travel businesses with intelligent software tools that optimize efficiency, increase profitability, and foster lasting relationships with customers.

sections.heading: Vision
sections.content: To revolutionize the travel industry through cutting-edge technology solutions that deliver unparalleled value and seamless travel experiences for businesses and travellers worldwide.

sections.heading: History
sections.content: Our passion for Travel and Technology led us to start Resh and Thosh in the year 2012. A humble start from a one room office with strong determination and whole world ahead of us. Earned the trust of large OTA, corporate travel companies through successful delivery of solutions that make a difference. Building innovative solutions that made a huge difference in the way a travel company functions. Moved to a modern office space with a team of young and energetic professionals who build solutions to meet various customer requirements and support them.

sections.heading: Founders
sections.content: SANTHOSHKUMAR MUTHU,  Santhosh is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of invaluable expertise in the dynamic realm of travel technology. As the Chief Technology Officer, he serves as the undisputed tech backbone of our organization, wielding a profound understanding of the industry’s intricacies. Santhosh’s remarkable problem-solving skills set him apart, allowing him to navigate challenges with finesse and foresight. His ability to envision solutions beyond the immediate scope ensures that our technology landscape remains innovative and future-ready. His wealth of experience not only contributes to the company’s success but also plays a pivotal role in mentoring and shaping the careers of our younger team members. A passionate advocate for knowledge sharing, Santhosh fosters a collaborative and growth-oriented environment within the team. His commitment to developing talent is evident as he actively defines career paths, empowering the next generation of tech professionals to thrive and excel. At the forefront of technological advancements, Santhosh possesses a deep understanding of the latest trends and innovations. His visionary approach extends to crafting and steering the technical roadmap of the company. By aligning our technological strategies with industry best practices, he ensures that our company remains at the forefront of innovation and efficiency. In summary, Santhosh is not just a CTO; he is the driving force behind our technological evolution, combining experience, mentorship, and a forward-thinking approach to lead our team into a future of sustained success.  SURESH BASKARAN Suresh, a seasoned professional with an impressive track record of over 25 years in the intersection of Travel and Technology, stands as the visionary leader at the helm of our organization. His extensive experience serves as a foundation for steering the company towards unprecedented success. As CEO, Suresh is dedicated to fostering a work environment that thrives on learning and growth. His leadership style is characterized by a commitment to creating a workspace where each team member is inspired to reach their full potential. Suresh’s keen understanding of the Travel and Technology sectors positions him as a beacon of knowledge and guidance for the entire organization. Having successfully led large teams, Suresh brings a wealth of expertise in managing and motivating professionals. His exposure to international markets has not only broadened his perspective but has also equipped him with a global outlook, making him a respected figure in the industry. Suresh’s unique strength lies in his ability to cultivate enduring relationships with customers. Through years of experience, he has honed the art of understanding client needs and building trust. His customer-centric approach has allowed the company to not only meet but exceed customer expectations, leading to sustained customer engagement and loyalty. In summary, Suresh is not just a CEO; he is a dynamic leader who combines decades of experience with a commitment to creating a workplace culture of continuous learning, growth, and customer-centricity. His leadership is instrumental in propelling the company towards new heights of success and innovation.
